params._sellAmount: sell amount, in the token itself

calculatePurchaseReturn(uint256,uint256,.notice: Calculate purchase return amount that always return 0 value. Will accept 4 parameters to support backward compatibility with bancor formula. https://github.com/AragonBlack/fundraising/blob/master/apps/bancor-formula/contracts/BancorFormula.sol

calculateSaleReturn(uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Calculate sale return amount based on the Current MYNT supply. Will accept 4 parameters to support backward compatibility with bancor formula. https://github.com/AragonBlack/fundraising/blob/master/apps/bancor-formula/contracts/BancorFormula.sol
